}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *Wireless standards: 802.11an/ac (5GHz) *Output power: 500mW (27dBm) *Connector: 2x MMCX
==See also== *[[MikroTik R11e-5HacT]] - 802.11ac High Power Triple Chain Mini PCIe Card *[[MikroTik R11e-5HacD]] - 802.11ac High Power Dual Chain Mini PCIe Card :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7R11E5HACD TV7R11E5HACD] (07/09/2014), OUI: 4C:5E:0C • [https://www.roc-noc.com/mikrotik/routerboard/R11e-5HacD.html r0c-n0c] :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9882 2T2R 802.11an/ac *[[MikroTik R11e-5HnD]] - 5GHz 802.11a/n High Power Mini PCIe Card :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7R11E5HND TV7R11E5HND] (01/24/2014), OUI: 4C:5E:0C • [https://www.roc-noc.com/mikrotik/radio/R11e-5HnD.html r0c-n0c] :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9582 2T2R 802.11an • [http://lanmarket.ua/stats/obzor-besprovodnoy-miniPCI-e-karty-Mikrotik-R11e-5HnD Review on ''LM'']
